name: DiceUp
description:
This game was made for the "GMTK Game Jam 2022".

The theme was "Roll of the Dice".

This was an idea scrounged together the night prior to the deadline, so about 5-6 hours of work. There's a typo on the first level but apart from that it should be functional. I'm tired now.... XD

CONTROLS -> WASD or ARROW KEYS

GOAL: MOVE THE DICE until the DOTS are FACING UPWARD ON THE GOAL

ALSO! a preview of the sides of the die is shown on the top left of the screen.

Made using:

- Godot 3

- Aesprite

- SFXR
